sqlMap.statement: SELECT W.INVTY_TRX_PK ,W.GLBL_CMPY_CD FROM STK_IN_RSLT_WRK W WHERE W.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
SELECT W.INVTY_TRX_PK ,W.GLBL_CMPY_CD FROM STK_OUT_RSLT_WRK W WHERE W.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
SELECT W.INV_NUM ,W.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM ,W.INV_LINE_NUM ,W.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM ,W.INV_LINE_SUB_TRX_NUM ,W.GLBL_CMPY_CD FROM SLS_RSLT_WRK W WHERE W.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
